name: iPayQuickPay℠
0:
”Alexa, open iPay QuickPay.”
”What is my next scheduled payment?”
”Send twenty-five dollars on December fifth.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ipay quickpay
des:
iPay QuickPay℠ is a voice service that allows you to make payments, review scheduled payments or payment history, and more. iPay QuickPay℠ is linked to your financial institution, so you do not need to enter your personal financial information. However, your financial institution must offer iPay QuickPay℠ in order for you to use this skill.

Before you begin, log into your online banking account and select the “Bill Pay” link. If your financial institution offers iPay QuickPay℠, go to “My Account”, create your voice credentials and enable the skill by linking your account. To get started, just say, “Alexa, start iPay QuickPay℠.”
